title: How to write a permission letter for an internship to the principal - Quora

response.answer_text: Writing a permission letter for an internship This answer comprises two samples for your reference, please read both of them, and select whichever is best appropriate for you.  Sample 1 This is a format for writing a formal application letter to the school /college principal. From, xxxxxx (your name) xxxxxx (address) xxxxxx (place) xx-xx-xxxx (Date) To, The Principal xxxxxxxxxx (school name) xxxxxx (place) Subject: Application for an internship Sir/Ma'am, I would like to apply for an internship in your reputed school/college under the teaching department for a period of xxxx (mention the period). I am also attaching my resume that lists out all my academic qualifications, achievements and credentials. I request you to kindly have a look at it and consider my application. I will be looking forward to hearing from you about the possibility and opportunity. Thanking you. Yours sincerely xxxxxx (your name) xxxxxx (contact)  Sample 2 From, xxxxxx (your name) xxxxxx (address) xxxxxx (place) xx-xx-xxxx (Date) To, The Principal xxxxxxxxxx (school name) xxxxxx (place) Subject: Application for an internship Sir/Ma'am, I am xxxxx (your name), studying in final year xxxxx (write about the course). I would like ask your permission to start my internship as part of my course requirements from the month June, 2020. It's a 3 month internship training. Therefore, I request you to grant me a permission to start my internship for the period mentioned above. Thanking you in anticipation Yours obediently xxxxx (your name) Department Admission No.  I hope this answer is helpful to you. Thank you.

your name Address Date To, The Principal, address Kind attention : Name of the principal. Respected Sir/Madam, Sub : Request for an internship in your esteemed school. With reference to the above, I take this opportunity to kindly request you to allow me to do internship in your reputed school. I enclose herewith a short resume for your perusal and record. I hope you will be kind enough to oblige and looking forward to positive reply. Thanking you, Yours Sincerely Name.
